overview: Two former WWI aces from opposite sides, Bill Ramsey and Otto Shumann, in the best tradition of Eddie Rickenbacker and the Red Baron, barnstorm their way across the Poverty Row skies of middle-America while competing for daredevil honors and the favors of the lovely Eve.
tagline: Drama of the Gay Carnivals and a Grim Battle for Love Fought to Death in the Skies!
title: Air Eagles
